name: Espace Vie Étudiante - E.V.E., 72000 Le Mans, France
McDonald's Carré Feydeau
directions:
Premier étage, à gauche
First floor on the left
comment:
English below
Vous devez être un.e client.e. L'Espresso est l'article le moins cher. Le code est sur le ticket. Vous pouvez également demander poliment à un.e des membres de l'équipe, il est possible qu'iel puisse accepter de vous faire entrer.
You must be a customer. The espresso is the cheapest item on the menu. The code is on the receipt. You can also try to ask politely a member of the staff, sometimes they accept to let you in for free.

name: KFC
directions: Upstairs, there is an elevator.
comment: You need the code on your receipt to access the bathroom.

name: 89 Boulevard de la Falaise, 17132 Meschers-sur-Gironde, France
directions: Just behind the parking, its a little « house » made of wood
comment: Its free ^^

name: Café Mareva
directions: In the back left of the café.
comment: I think it is for customers of the café, but if you ask nicely or pay a small fee you might be allowed to go.

name: Toileeeets
street: 1 Rue du Grand Rabbin Joseph Bloch
directions: Go in the street, and then when you see public restroom with a Pikachu on the wall look at your right, there are single gender neutral toilets!
comment: Its free and Clean!

name: O'Paradis Taste
directions: It's a little cafe on the corner,
comment: The toilet looks like it doubles as a storage, but is very clean.

name: Toilet Sébastopol theater
directions: Behind the theater
comment: Free

name: Le baigneur
directions: Au fond, pour les clients

name: Saint-Paul-de-Vence
directions: At the side of the street in a little house
comment: The stalls cost 20 cents. There is also a seperate free house with urinals.

name: Bel omrage campsite
directions: A row of gender reutral stalls near the car entrance

name: Le Medieval
directions:
When you enter, to the right towards the back room, just before entering it it'll be to the right

Quand tu entre, a droite comme pour aller à la salle du fond, et juste avant celle-ci ce sera sur la droite
comment:
It is very crowded and charged decoration-wise, so it may be too much and a little claustrophobic for some people

C'est très chargé niveau décorations, donc ça peut être trop et claustrophobique pour certaines personnes

name: Maison des Jeunes et de la Culture
directions: Close to the desk
comment: Ask for some info if there is someone, and ask to go the toilets. You can also access the toilet if you are a member :) not always open though!

name: Shakespeare and Co Cafe
directions: It’s directly next to the exit door on the side street, or if you’re looking at the counter it’s to the far left.
comment: It’s a single toilette, gender neutral.  The only reason I’m not putting accessible is because it’s a small space and I can’t remember if there is a small ledge to step up into the cafe, but persons with limited mobility should be fine.  You have to be a paying customer, and it is right next to the counter.  But if it looked like you were coming from the outside tables on a busy day (most times) then I don’t know that anyone would notice.

name: Mi Ranchito Paisa
directions: At the back behind the red swinging doors
comment: Ask nicely and they'll let you use the bathroom. If you're shy order a coffee

gratuit et non genré
